meanings.definition: Of or relating to the Elapidae family of venomous snakes.
meanings.sent1: The elapine snake had distinct markings on its scales.
meanings.sent2: The zookeeper studied the elapine species for years.
meanings.sent3: The elapine snake tried to hiss but only managed a squeak.
meanings.sent4: Her sharp words were like an elapine strike in the argument.
meanings.sent5: The elapine characteristics made it easy to identify in the wild.

meanings.definition: Resembling or characteristic of a member of the Elapidae family.
meanings.sent1: The painting had an elapine color scheme with greens and blacks.
meanings.sent2: Her movements were elapine, graceful and precise.
meanings.sent3: The elapine pattern on the fabric caught everyone's eye.
meanings.sent4: His elapine behavior in the competition showed his skill.
meanings.sent5: The elapine features of the car made it stand out on the road.

meanings.definition: A venomous snake of the Elapidae family.
meanings.sent1: The elapine slithered silently through the grass.
meanings.sent2: A researcher discovered a new elapine species in the rainforest.
meanings.sent3: The elapine in the exhibit seemed to be posing for the visitors.
meanings.sent4: The elapine's bite was swift and deadly.
meanings.sent5: The elapine's hood spread wide as a warning to predators.
